Areas of Expertise 
Environmental organic chemistry relating to the following research topics; 
1. Health risk assessment of persistent toxic substances (PTS) through dietary daily intake.

Research Interest 
1. Pollution levels, fate, and effects of various semi volatile organic pollutants such as butyltin, polychlorinated dibenzodioxins and furans (PCDDs/Fs), OCPs, PAHs, and PCBs, in various environmental compartments.
